attributes.name: cancelled
attributes.description: True if the calendar event is cancelled. Default is false.

attributes.name: teachingLengthGroup
attributes.description: How many minutes the group's time is planned during the calendar event.

attributes.name: teachingLengthTeacher
attributes.description: How many minutes the teachers' time is planned during the calendar event.

attributes.name: teachingLengthStudent
attributes.description: How many minutes the students' time is planned during the calendar event.

attributes.name: activity
attributes.description: The activity for this calendar event.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the parent Activity.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Activity' resource.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name of the activity's course or subject, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: studentGroupExceptions
attributes.description: Student group exceptions from the activity groups TBD.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the StudentGroup.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Group' resource

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable student group name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: participates
subAttributes.description: Defines if the exception is additive or excluding.

subAttributes.name: teachingLength
subAttributes.description: Override the event's teachingLength for this exception. Default is 0, i.e. the entire time is excluded.

subAttributes.name: startTime
subAttributes.description: Start datetime for this exception. Default is the startTime of the event.

subAttributes.name: endTime
subAttributes.description: End datetime for this exception. Default is the endTime of the event.

attributes.name: teacherExceptions
attributes.description: Teacher exceptions from the activity groups TBD.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the Teacher.

subAttributes.name: $ref

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable user, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.description: Defines if the exception is additive or excluding.

subAttributes.name: teachingLength
subAttributes.description: Override the event's teachingLength for this exception. Default is 0, i.e. the entire time is excluded.

subAttributes.name: startTime
subAttributes.description: Start datetime for this exception. Default is the startTime of the event.

subAttributes.name: endTime
subAttributes.description: End datetime for this exception. Default is the endTime of the event.

attributes.name: studentExceptions
attributes.description: Student exceptions for this event. TBD.
